name: Report II
storyline: The story unfolds as it is not difficult to guess 20 years after the events of the first part. G-man threw Gerald into City -19, a city ruled by Brian. But before Gerald could get used to it, metropolice broke into the apartment where he lived and tied everyone up. From this moment, a new chapter in the history of the brave 35-year-old hero begins. Will he be able to overcome all the difficulties and stop the dictator?
summary: continuation of Gerald's adventures only within city 19, but 20 years after stasis. New secrets, new acquaintances, new villains are waiting for you in the second part.
